thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St gains for second straight day after selloff

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St gains for second straight day after selloff
text:
NEW YORK, Feb 12 (Reuters) - Wall Street’s three major indexes rebounded on Monday with broad-based gains across sectors as investors appeared to regain confidence after U.S. equities’ biggest weekly drop in two years.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 409.47 points, or 1.69 percent, to 24,600.37, the S&P 500 gained 36.39 points, or 1.39 percent, to 2,655.94 and the Nasdaq Composite added 107.47 points, or 1.56 percent, to 6,981.96. (Reporting by Sinéad Carew; Editing by Nick Zieminski)
